abstract: Data from the Web can provide tools that can save lives and money, as the authorities can schedule inoculations and staff up hospitals.
snippet: Data from the Web can provide tools that can save lives and money, as the authorities can schedule inoculations and staff up hospitals.
lead_paragraph: “SWINE flu” last week was the most searched term on Yahoo, displacing “American Idol.”

headline.main: The Hunt for Insights in the Online Chatter About Swine Flu
headline.print_headline: The Hunt for Insights in the Online Chatter About Swine Flu

abstract: The two companies share two directors, and several people briefed on the Federal Trade Commission inquiry say the agency is studying whether this is an antitrust violation.
snippet: The two companies share two directors, and several people briefed on the Federal Trade Commission inquiry say the agency is studying whether this is an antitrust violation.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The Federal Trade Commission has begun an inquiry into whether the close ties between the boards of two of technology’s most prominent companies, Apple and Google, amount to a violation of antitrust laws, according to several people briefed on the inquiry.

headline.main: Board Ties at Apple and Google Are Scrutinized
headline.print_headline: Board Ties At Apple And Google Scrutinized

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Brad Stone

abstract: The American Library Association and other groups asked a judge to ensure that a settlement doesn’t lead to sky-high prices for access to digitized books.
snippet: The American Library Association and other groups asked a judge to ensure that a settlement doesn’t lead to sky-high prices for access to digitized books.
lead_paragraph: Three groups representing libraries, including the American Library Association, the largest such group in the United States, have asked a federal judge to exercise “vigorous oversight” over a class-action settlement between Google, authors and publishers.

headline.main: Libraries Ask Judge to Monitor Google Books Settlement
